claim: The Portuguese Empire was an empire in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Portuguese Empire  (  Império Português  )  , also known as the Portuguese Overseas  (  Ultramar Português  )  , was one of the largest and longest-lived empires in world history and the first colonial empire of the Renaissance .

claim: The Portuguese Empire was an empire in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: World on the Move : The Portuguese in Africa , Asia , and America , 1415-1808  (  1992  )  explored the Portuguese Empire as the world 's first truly global empire , though one often overshadowed in the public imagination by the Spanish Empire ; Russell-Wood was intrigued by how the Portuguese made sense of their exposure to the once unimaginable vastness of the world , its people , languages , culture , flora , and fauna .

claim: The Portuguese Empire was an empire in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His first trip to India is widely considered a milestone in world history , as it marked the beginning of a sea-based phase of global multiculturalism .

claim: The Portuguese Empire was an empire in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Anthony John R. Russell-Wood  (  1940 - August 13 , 2010  )  was a leading historian of colonial Brazil , the Portuguese Empire , and the broader Luso-Brazilian world .

claim: The Portuguese Empire was an empire in world history.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Ottoman -- Portuguese or Turco-Portuguese conflicts refers to a series of different military encounters between the Portuguese Empire and the Ottoman Empire , or between other European powers and the Ottoman Empire in which relevant Portuguese military forces participated .
